A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Obviously the critics are too scared to give an honest review of a Star Wars movie or a Disney movie. And since this is both\, they’re bowing to the almighty mouse for fear of fan and Disney retribution. The story is a mess\, there’s too many plot lines going at once\, it tries to be a Marvel version of a Star Wars movie - and not in a good way. The prequels sucked\, but they at least felt like Star Wars.
